squidpony.squidgrid.gui

Class TextCellFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • squidpony.squidgrid.gui.CellFactory
      • squidpony.squidgrid.gui.TextCellFactory

  • public class TextCellFactory
extends CellFactory
    Singleton class for creating text blocks. The default characters guaranteed to fit are ASCII 33 through 125, which are the commonly used symbols, numbers, and letters. Whitespace defaults to being used on all characters.
    Author:
    Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com

    • Method Detail

      • setFitCharacters

        public void setFitCharacters(char[] fit,
                    boolean whiteSpace)
        Sets the array of characters that will be checked to ensure they all fit in the text block. One of the provided initialization methods must be called to then make this take effect.
        Parameters:
        fit -
        whiteSpace - true if there must be white space around all characters

      • initializeByFont

        public void initializeByFont(java.awt.Font font)
        Sets up the factory to provide images based on the font's size.
        Parameters:
        font -

      • initializeBySize

        public void initializeBySize(int cellWidth,
                    int cellHeight,
                    java.awt.Font font)
        Sets up the factory to provide images based on the cell cellWidth and cellHeight passed in. The font size will be used as a starting point, and reduced as needed to fit within the cell.
        Parameters:
        cellWidth -
        cellHeight -
        font -
        whiteSpace -

      • getInstance

        public static TextCellFactory getInstance()
        Gets the singleton instance.
        Returns:

      • willFit

        public boolean willFit(char c)
        Returns true if the given character will fit inside the current cell dimensions with the current font. ISO Control characters are considered to not fit by definition.
        Parameters:
        c -
        Returns:
